content:
§3Busses§r are needed to for Multiblocks in order to insert recipe inputs and retrieve recipe outputs.
Higher tier §3Busses§r have more slots for items

For fluids, you will need §3Hatches§r.

For fluids, there are also special §3Multi-Fluid Hatches§r, which can handle multiple fluids at the same time. These come in 4x and 9x versions.
